xuse:entry.xuse:title: Secure Sockets Layer
xuse:entry.xuse:description: An endpoint authentication and transport encryption standard typically to secure HTTP connections over the internet.

xuse:entry.xuse:title: Hypertext Transport Protocol
xuse:entry.xuse:description: Protocol used to convery information on the world wide web - typically used in conjunction with HTML to present web pages to clients.

xuse:entry.xuse:title: Authentication
xuse:entry.xuse:description: The process of verifying the identity of the party connecting to the the system.

xuse:entry.xuse:title: Authorisation
xuse:entry.xuse:description: The process whereby the system protects resources only allowing those users who have to correct privileges to access them.
